extendedInfo.description: Quickly and easily view your live Cloud Camera feeds and manage your Cloud Routers from anywhere using a Wi-Fi or 3G/4G connection. Whether you're at the office, having an evening out, or away on vacation, the mydlink Lite app gives you access to your Cloud Cameras, Cloud Routers and NVR even when youâre on-the-go. You can also check your Cloud Routerâs current upload/download bandwidth, or manage your wireless network security and status. Parental controls let you see what sites your children have visited when you were away, and you can even block or unblock network access for individual devices.For more information, go to mydlink.com or dlink.comFeatures of the mydlink Lite: - View live video from your Cloud Camera, including a full-screen view.- Save snapshots of your cameraâs video to your Phone - View the online status of your Cloud Cameras and Cloud Routers- Remotely monitor and configure your Cloud Routers- Access and view your camera's video feed (without audio) through your NVR.- Touch and drag to move your view around for non-PT cameras. Pinch to zoom in/out.- Toggle camera's view modes between Night mode, Day mode, and Automatic mode.- After initial settings on the mydlink website, you can enable/disable motion/sound detection from the app for supported cameras.- You can talk back with 2-way audio support (for DCS-942L)- SD Card Playback (for DCS-942L)This app is compatible with the following models:- Cloud Cameras: DCS-930L,DCS-932L,DCS-933L,DCS-931L,DCS-942L,DCS-5211L,DCS-5222L,DCS-2332L,DCS-6010L,DCS-2132L,DCS-2310L,DCS-7010L,DCS-5020L,DCS-5010L,DCS-2136L- Cloud Routers: DAP-1160L,DAP-1360L,DIR-140L,DIR-505L,DIR-506L,DIR-600L,DIR-600LW,DIR-602L,DIR-605L,DIR-605LW,DIR-619L,DIR-626L,DIR-636L,DIR-640L,DIR-645L,DIR-810L,DIR-820L,DIR-826L,DIR-836L,DIR-840L,DIR-845L,DIR-850L,DIR-855L,DIR-860L,DIR-865L,DIR-868L ,DIR-900L,DIR-905L,DSL-2770L,DSL-2870B,DSL-2890AL- NVR: DNR-322LNote: * For Cloud Storage support, please download the mydlink Access-NAS app.* mydlink Lite officially supports Android 4.0 or above. * The mydlink Lite app is dynamically linked to the FFmpeg shared video decoding library, which is compiled to contain LGPL decoders and splitters only. The repository can be cloned from git://github.com/dlinker/mydlink-Lite---Android.git using the git clone command.*For tablet users, we recommend downloading the mydlink+ app.* mydlink Lite is not guaranteed to support Android devices using "dirty" linux kernel (e.g. LG P990).

reviews.title: You ought to have a tutorial
reviews.comment: There\'s some hidden features you should explain when first launching the app
reviews.author: Josue Rios

reviews.title: DCS-942L
reviews.comment: SD Card playback on DCS-942L keeps getting \"The current video clip is unable to play\". Please fix. Thank you.
reviews.author: Dan Q

reviews.title: Cant connect anymore!
reviews.comment: App was great for first month, then couldnt connect to the mydlink server for over a week. Had to uninstall and reinstall to get it to work. Now cant reinstall from google play. I have Samsung Galaxy Centura. HELP!!!
reviews.author: Jim Marx

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Upgraded to android 4.3 then no longer works. Gray circle just keeps spinning but no video comes out. Used to work fine before I upgraded. Pls check
reviews.author: Francis Patrick Basilio

reviews.title: No MIC select for DCS-2332L
reviews.comment: My Phone is S3 & There is no 2-Way audio option for DCS-2332L , no SD Video playback option, random app crash when 480P selected however all above works for my DCS-942L which is lower end , please fix it
reviews.author: KAMRAN B

reviews.title: Lacking
reviews.comment: I can\'t control motion sensing options from the app. The pan buttons are way too small and lack feedback so I always either press it too many or too few times. It also doesn\'t have preset camera positing options which would probably solve the pan problem I\'m having. You can do better d link.
reviews.author: Jarett Payne

reviews.title: Can\'t view on 3G
reviews.comment: S3 on 3G network can\'t connect to view. Wifi is fine. Pls solve it. Its still nt working on data network unless wifi.
reviews.author: leo cher

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy tab 2 7.0
reviews.comment: After 2 or more updates I can\'t use app to block any devices and change name or password of wifi.Fix this quick!!!!!!
reviews.author: kushal panjabi

reviews.title: Video lost error 98% of time!!!
reviews.comment: Have two dcs930l camera they work great from the web browser but this app sucks. 98% of the time I get a video connection to your device was lost please try again. So I hit reconnect samething sign out back in samething delete app reinstall camera works for 30 seconds then get same thing. Im on the go a lot with my job and if this app doesn\'t work this cameras a worthless to me such a shame!!
reviews.author: David Shankle

reviews.title: Will give five stars when fixed.
reviews.comment: DLink needs to figure out a way to have the cameras auto focus when pinch zooming.
reviews.author: Mlke Bradley

reviews.title: User interface needs help
reviews.comment: There are several options available on the pc interface that would help, such as the \"quick scan\" button.  Also, I find that I get a better response using the mouse vs the touch screen buttons on my HTC MyTouch to move the camera.
reviews.author: Shawn Hammack

reviews.title: Terrible lag, poor control
reviews.comment: This app need much work, even when on fast wifi network the picture lags and controlling the direction and tilt is marginal at best... Spastic.  Please FIX.
reviews.author: Daniel Gonzalez

reviews.title: DCS5222L
reviews.comment: Both iphone and android: 1. Screen rotates when pan/tilting the cam 2. No button for Patrol 3. No SD video playback 4. Very poor Video quality for a HD cam * Video Quality of Prolink PIC1005WN (VGA cam) is much better *Prolink\'s mLiveView app has all the features and is FREE!
reviews.author: Michael Angelo

reviews.title: Low frame rate.
reviews.comment: Im getting very low frame rate from my new dsc 5020L at most 5fps while browser viewer runs smooth its impossible to view camera from my Galaxy S4. Im running LTE on my phone and 10mbps upload bandwith at home. Pretty sure its a software issue aince my tablet has the same problem. Returning camera back to Bestbuy tomorrow to get a better product.
reviews.author: Arnie P

reviews.title: Useless because you can\'t adjust the camera angle from phone.
reviews.comment: It has no function to adjust the camera angle. This can be done from computer only. So why buy the IP camera which can\'t adjust from phone.
reviews.author: Win Maw

reviews.title: Works but
reviews.comment: It works really well though there\'s 15 second lag with my 5020L. Great work guys!
reviews.author: Ayan Ashraf

reviews.title: Different
reviews.comment: Galaxy2 works great, Tab2 10.1 the view picture size is tiny. Weird but free.
reviews.author: Pat Eastman

reviews.title: Frequently loses connection
reviews.comment: Often times loses connection (tried 3 different Android devices with same results) and DOESN\'T auto reconnect. Laptop viewing works fine.
reviews.author: David Allen

reviews.comment: The app should give the option to delete storage to continue download should consider upgrade thanks\tI would most definitely consider the app with that option
reviews.author: cory williams

reviews.title: Issues
reviews.comment: Can you guys fix the issues I\'m having problem to log in ... please
reviews.author: A Google User
